title: Regression in StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest with 72ea2b54d

labels.name: feature/assertion
labels.description: Issues related to assertions and expectations

body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version     | 12.1.4
| PHP version         | any, tested on 8.3.20
| Installation Method | Composer

#### Summary

With https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/72ea2b54d we sadly introduced a regression that breaks %A matching in StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest for multiline matches.

With %A greedily matching the whole document and thus changing the test result instead of improving the diff.

#### Current behavior

As it's annoying to paste diffs of diffs I made a reproduce:

The test can be seen here: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/compare/main...edorian:phpunit:regression-test-72ea2b54d#diff-ee7078c6148f6e7190b9f9eef5217f3986cbfc027b4608fc9bfab296f2605708R271-R332

#### How to reproduce

Copy the updated test(s) either from my branch or from the end of this ticket into tests/unit/Framework/Constraint/String/StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest.php</summary>

```
git checkout 72ea2b5^ # revision before the issue
➜  phpunit git:(34e4489c8) ./phpunit tests/unit/Framework/Constraint/String/StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest.php
PHPUnit 11.5.18 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:       PHP 8.3.20
Configuration: /Users/edo/private/phpunit/phpunit.xml

.....................                                             21 / 21 (100%)

Time: 00:00.010, Memory: 10.00 MB

OK (21 tests, 88 assertions)
```

vs

```
➜  phpunit git:(72ea2b54d) ✗ ./phpunit tests/unit/Framework/Constraint/String/StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest.php
PHPUnit 11.5.18 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:       PHP 8.3.20
Configuration: /Users/edo/private/phpunit/phpunit.xml

..................F..                                             21 / 21 (100%)

Time: 00:00.010, Memory: 12.00 MB

There was 1 failure:

1) PHPUnit\Framework\Constraint\StringMatchesFormatDescriptionTest::testFailureMessageWithNewlinesAndAnythingMatcherMultilineMatches
Failed asserting that exception of type "PHPUnit\Framework\ExpectationFailedException" is thrown.
```

#### Expected behavior

https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/compare/main...edorian:phpunit:regression-test-72ea2b54d#diff-ee7078c6148f6e7190b9f9eef5217f3986cbfc027b4608fc9bfab296f2605708R327-R329

The test case ends in 
```
*
Additional Text that is not matched
```

This was not matched with the old implementation and is marked as matching now.

The easiest fix would be to revert 72ea2b54d and maybe @sebastianfeldmann or I try again with a couple more tests :)

---

### TestCase

```php
    public function testFailureMessageWithNewlinesAndAnythingMatcherMultilineMatches(): void
    {
        $constraint = new StringMatchesFormatDescription(<<<'EOD'
## before first A
%A
## after first A
*
## before second A
%A
## after second A
*
Foo: %s

EOD
        );

        $this->expectException(ExpectationFailedException::class);
        $this->expectExceptionMessage(
            <<<'EOD'
Failed asserting that string matches format description.
--- Expected
+++ Actual
@@ @@
 ## before first A
 some multiline
+text for
+A to match
 ## after first A
 *
 ## before second A
+more multiline text
+for A to match
+## after second A
 *
-## after second A
+Foo: s match
 *
-Foo: %s
+Additional Text that is not matched

EOD
        );

        $constraint->evaluate(<<<'EOD'
## before first A
some multiline
text for
A to match
## after first A
*
## before second A
more multiline text
for A to match
## after second A
*
Foo: s match
*
Additional Text that is not matched
EOD
);
    }
```
